_sText:
SURF_DIGITAL[G]BETA1 by X-Shark
SURF_DIGITAL[G]BETA_FIXED by Target Practice

- Thanks for downloading surf_digital[g]beta_fixed! 
- This map was originally made by X-Shark. I have merely edited it to eliminate spawnkilling and add other attributes.
- The gameplay of this map has NOT been altered.
- Permission was granted by author X-Shark for the release of this map.
- Many thanks to X-Shark for creating surf_digital[g]beta1.

_________________________________________________

To install this map:

- Steam>steamapps>[username]>counter-strike source>cstrike>maps

- Place the surf_digital[g]beta_fixed.bsp in your MAPS folder...done!

_________________________________________________

The changes I have made:

- Surf at spawn is now split into 2 segments with a wall to prevent spawnkilling.
- Teleport at top is now wider to stop players falling off when they teleport.
- Glass near scouts has been retextured (when compiled it came out very bright).
- Scouts zone now has water to prevent fall damage.
- Boosts added when you spawn in jail to stop people camping the corners.
- Glass at jail is now thinner so all weapons can shoot through it.
- Glass at jail top is now retextured to make it easier to see into jail.
- Glass at jail has been lengthened and retextured to prevent camper spots at shotguns.
- Teleport rooms to shotgun and m4a1 spawns at jail are now brighter.
- Jail retextured.
- Other minor fixes.
_________________________________________________

www.dragonrock.org
_________________________________________________

If you have any problems or queries about this version then feel free to contact me:

- xfire: targetpractice808
- STEAM Friends: Target Practice

Otherwise you may contact the original author, X-Shark who can be found at www.solidsurf.info.
